registration.user_exists: The given email is already in use.
registration.social_failed: There is a problem with social login method. Try again later.
registration.captcha_failed: You have failed captcha validation. Please, try again.

auth.invalid_forgot_password_link: Invalid forgot password link. Request a new one.

user.no_user: The requested user does not exist.
user.invalid_privilege: You have no sufficient privilege to do this action.

wallet.cannot_create_new_wallet: A new wallet cannot be created.
wallet.not_enough_funds: You have not enough funds on your wallet.
wallet.wallet_already_registered: This wallet has already been registered.
wallet.deposit_already_minted: Requested deposit has already been finalized.
wallet.deposit_not_approved: Invalid action. The transaction cannot be processed if not approved.
wallet.unapproved_deposit_exists: You already have an unprocessed deposit. A new one cannot be created.
wallet.missing_withdrawal: Requested withdrawal has not been found.
wallet.unapproved_withdraw_exists: You already have an unprocessed withdrawal. A new one cannot be created.
wallet.withdraw_already_approved: Forbidden action because the withdrawal has already been approved.
wallet.withdraw_not_approved: Forbidden action because the withdrawal has not already been approved.
wallet.withdraw_already_burned: Forbidden action because the withdrawal has already been processed.
wallet.wallet_not_activated_by_admin: Forbidden action! Wallet must be activated by administrator.
wallet.missing_revenue_payout: Invalid action. Requested revenue payout transaction is missing.

organization.user_already_member: The user is already member of this organization.
organization.user_already_invited: The user has already been invited to this organization.
organization.invalid_org_invitation: Some emails are in the wrong format.
organization.org_membership_missing: The user is not a member of this organization.

project.project_expired: The project investing period has expired.
project.user_exceeded_max_funds: You have exceeded the maximum investment amount.
project.project_not_active: The project is not active anymore.
